header.overview: The header defines a macro that converts an to an integer literal.

macro.abstract: The macro converts its argument to an integer literal.
macro.para: This macro expands to an integer literal represented by x. If x is an representing a negative number, this macro prefixes the result with a unary negation operator (-).
